You may underestimate the amount of work you are taking on, ending up overwhelmed and unable to keep up with the demands of running an e-commerce store.
Building an e-commerce store requires skills and knowledge in many areas, such as web development, marketing, and customer service, which may be beyond your current expertise.
You may have difficulty getting enough customers to your store or generating sufficient sales to make it profitable.
There is a risk of security issues or hacking if you are not properly securing your store and website.
Managing inventory and shipping can be time-consuming and challenging, particularly if you are not doing this for the first time.
